text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Maybe even Fox is getting sick & tired of your Lying Game as most of the rest of us. You think Covid19 isn't affecting some of their viewers (your base) too? People need truth not lies & cover ups. You really need to #ResignNow . Everything you're involved in turns to crap!
